00083 class SkAutoMaskImage {
00084 public:
00085     SkAutoMaskImage(SkMask* mask, bool alloc)
00086     {
00087         if (alloc)
00088             mask->fImage = SkMask::AllocImage(mask->computeImageSize());
00089         fImage = mask->fImage;
00090     }
00091     ~SkAutoMaskImage()
00092     {
00093         SkMask::FreeImage(fImage);
00094     }
00095 private:
00096     uint8_t*    fImage;
00097 };
